ch0090_41_daigo/0101_0701_02_10:
Since we’ve crossed paths, how about we go on
an adventure together to solve mysteries on Pasio?
ch0090_41_daigo/7101_0701_01_10:
To be a detective, you need intelligence and
keen observation.
ch0090_41_daigo/7101_0701_02_10:
You also need endurance and resilience for when
a case drags on a long time.
ch0090_41_daigo/7101_0701_03_10: And you can’t forget a reliable partner!
ch0090_41_daigo/7102_0701_01_10:
When I think over things in these clothes, I can
concentrate better than usual.
ch0090_41_daigo/7102_0701_02_10:
Although...I worry the look could draw attention
while on stakeouts.
ch0090_41_daigo/7102_0701_03_10:
Next time I see Looker, I’ll ask him for tips on
blending in.
ch0090_41_daigo/7103_0701_01_10:
Stoutland is good at finding lost items, so he’s
great to have around when you’re looking for
something.
ch0090_41_daigo/7103_0701_02_10:
Although these days, he keeps bringing me rocks...
Maybe he’s taking on some of my traits.
ch0090_41_daigo/7104_0701_01_10:
A detective’s job is to seek the truth behind
accidents and incidents.
ch0090_41_daigo/7104_0701_02_10:
That said, it’d be better if we could prevent such
things rather than just deal with them after
they’re done.
ch0090_41_daigo/7105_0701_01_10:
I know what you’re up to,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0090_41_daigo/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m guessing you want to be part of a strong and
reliable sync pair that everyone loves, right?
ch0090_41_daigo/7105_0701_03_10:
I didn’t even have to deduce that. I can tell just by
looking at you.
ch0090_41_daigo/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s a present. Stoutland found this.
ch0090_41_daigo/1701_0702_01_10: My deductions tell me you’ll like it. Am I right?
ch0090_41_daigo/2501_0701_01_10: I’m good at finding and investigating things.
ch0090_41_daigo/2501_0701_03_10:
Becoming an independent detective instead of
inheriting my father’s business doesn’t sound too
bad, actually.
ch0090_41_daigo/2501_0702_01_10: I wonder what path is best for me...
ch0090_41_daigo/2501_0702_02_10:
I guess I’ll find out while continuing to seek
new experiences.
ch0090_41_daigo/2511_0701_01_10: The world is still full of mysteries.
ch0090_41_daigo/2511_0701_02_10:
If I were to solve all those mysteries one by one...
I don’t think it’d be much fun.
ch0090_41_daigo/2511_0701_03_10: Some things are more exciting when left a mystery.
ch0090_41_daigo/2511_0702_01_10:
Take the numerous legends spread across the
world, for example...
ch0090_41_daigo/2511_0702_02_10:
Their being out of reach is what makes people
want to pursue them.
ch0090_41_daigo/3001_0701_01_10:
You’re always so active and full of life!
Just being around you gives me a boost of energy.
ch0090_41_daigo/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio is a big island. Before you sprint across it
in one go, try taking your time and enjoying
the sights.
ch0090_41_daigo/3005_0701_01_10:
Some stones shine brightly even in the deepest
darkness...like the stars that shine in the night sky.
